docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: ふぉっふぉっふぉ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 第1章 基礎（Hello, 型、制御構文）
Hello World
docs.text:
```csharp using System;

public class HelloWorld { public static void Main() { Console.WriteLine("Hello, world!"); } }

docs.title: 第1章 基礎（Hello, 型、制御構文）
Hello World
docs.text:
```csharp

using System;

public class HelloWorld
{
    public static void Main()
    {
        Console.WriteLine("Hello, world!");
    }

}
